Если вы осваиваете корейский язык, то ко: If you are learning Korean, TOPIK (Test of Proficiency in Korean), a special Korean language proficiency test, will be your compass on your educational journey. This certification system was developed back in 1997 by the South Korean government. To this day it is the main one. Most often the test is taken by those who plan to study at universities in South Korea, to find employment in companies in this country or by foreigners applying for permanent residence here.
Всегда полезно определить точку, в котор: It is always good to identify the point at which you are at in order to build the way forward. This is also important when learning a foreign language.
На сегодняшний день существует два уровн: There are currently two levels of the test: TOPIK I and TOPIK II.
В TOPIK I включены подуровни 1 и 2. Уров: TOPIK I includes sub-levels 1 and 2. The level is called “gyp” (급) in Korean. It is the beginning level of Korean language proficiency. In the TOPIK I test, examinees are tested in two main areas: listening and reading. The tasks must be completed in 100 minutes. These will be multiple-choice questions for listening and reading.
TOPIK II состоит из четырех подуровней (: TOPIK II consists of four sublevels (3 to 6). These are intermediate and advanced levels. On the TOPIK II exam, examinees will have to answer questions from three blocks: listening (50 questions), reading (50 questions) and writing (2 short-answer tasks, 1 graphic description, 1 essay). The time limit for completing the tasks is 180 minutes.
На данном уровне оцениваемый должен умет: At this level, the assessed must be able to compose simple sentences using a vocabulary of up to 800 words. He/she should compose simple monologues and dialogues on the topics “Me and my family”, “Grocery shopping”, “My work”, “My hobbies”, “Weather”, “Transportation”, “How to find the way”, express feelings and opinions in common words. In their speech at this level it is necessary to use: cases, particles, question words, negations, inflection, afterwords, numbers (dates, time, counting words), polite forms, participles, tenses (future, past, continued present), adverbs, conjunctions, particles, expressions of reason, comparative and qualifying constructions, exclamations, etc., etc..
На этом уровне вы уже должны будете умет: At this level you should already be able to talk formally and informally in various simple everyday situations. This could be a bank, a restaurant, a store, a post office, transport, a hospital, a pharmacy, a hotel, different types of transport. You should be able to ask and explain the situation. You should also be able to talk about cooking, holidays, gifts, traveling at this stage. In this case, the vocabulary should be 1500-2000 words, and in conversation you should be able to use different techniques of word formation, qualifying constructions, permissive forms, forms of exclamation, the form “or” , “azh”, the participle form, word-forming particles, complex forms of reasons, the form “even if”, the form of comparison, the form “about something”, “in order to”, interruption of action, forms of continued action, complex participle, time intervals, complex form “know-not to know” + uncertainty, etc.
Словарный запас среднего уровня должен с: An intermediate level vocabulary should contain about 3,500 words.
Вы без затруднений должны пользоваться к: You should have no difficulty using Korean in your daily life in your close circle, in public places, and in various social roles. You should be able to express yourself fluently on familiar topics and in some special situations. Vocabulary should be at least 3490 words. You must be able to use up to 157 grammatical forms in speech. You should be able to use complex forms with indirect speech, the form “as soon as”, “even if”, “not only, but also”, oppositions, , indefinite particles, complex forms of reasons, comparisons, sequential actions, forms of complex past tense, clarifying questions, completed actions, expressing assumption, uncertainty, passive voice, indirect speech, expressing experience, regret, disagreement, experience, habits, etc., etc., as well as expressions of the passive voice.
На этом уровне аттестуемый должен продем: At this level, the student must demonstrate that he/she can use the language fluently in a variety of situations: in public institutions, in everyday communication, and in various social roles. You should be able to read and understand magazine and newspaper articles, express yourself on social and abstract topics, understand idiomatic expressions and Korean culture. Language proficiency should be sufficient to use a variety of public services, to be able to make contacts and maintain social relationships, to perform professional duties and tasks, and to compose simple documents. The vocabulary should expand to 4095 words. Knowledge of 224 grammatical forms is mandatory.
Продвинутый уровень предполагает не прос: The advanced level implies not just the fluent use of the language in various life situations, but the ability to use it for research and work in certain areas. The assessed person should be able to maintain a conversation on a variety of topics not very familiar to him/her, be it politics, economics, social life or culture. It is necessary to be able to understand what style of language is appropriate to use in a particular situation, whether it is colloquial or literary, and to apply the right style successfully and appropriately depending on the situation. Communicative language skills must be at a high enough level to accompany analytical, scientific disputes, discussions, debates. It is so important to correctly find and select appropriate information, summarize, clarify, argue, select evidence, and summarize in Korean. The examinee should be able to compose a text, report, write a literary, scientific, business essay. At Level 5, the required vocabulary is 6,460 words and grammatical forms are 280.
Лексическая норма для 6 уровня - 9040 сл: The lexical norm for level 6 is 9040 words.
Это самый высокий уровень знания корейск: This is the highest level of proficiency in Korean. A fluent Korean speaker can use the language fluently and perfectly in any sphere of life, including scientific research and highly specialized vocabulary in his or her field. He can easily carry on a conversation on any (even completely unfamiliar) topics in different fields. This level of speech is very close to the level of a native speaker. The lexical norm for level 6 is 9040 words, the number of grammatical forms required for proficiency is 336.
